summary: A family's home is haunted by a host of demonic ghosts.
cast: Craig T. Nelson|JoBeth Williams|Beatrice Straight|Dominique Dunne|Oliver Robins|Heather O'Rourke|Michael McManus|Virginia Kiser|Martin Casella|Richard Lawson|Zelda Rubinstein|James Karen|Lou Perryman|Clair E. Leucart|Dirk Blocker|Allan Graf|Joseph Walsh|Helen Baron|Noel Conlon|Robert Broyles|Sonny Landham|Jeffrey Bannister|William Vail|Craig Simmons|Phil Stone|Dana Gendian|Jaimi Gendian|Danny Nero|Paula Paulson
title: Poltergeist (Fenómenos extraños)
